title: Shockwave
description: Special Agent Kate Weiss is hiding from a kidnapping she doesn’t remember.Jack Tucker’s life as a morning radio host is uncomplicated, attachment free, and without regret.Brought together by a mutual friend, the pair are at odds from the moment they meet. She finds his confident swagger arrogant and beyond reproach, while he in turn sees her as a self-righteous controlling dictator.As Kate struggles with her confidence, Jack begins to realize his life without strings is missing something, or someone. Adversity quickly becomes attraction. Jack and Kate find themselves flirting with the flames of unexpected desire.As emotions rise, scars are revealed and secrets are uncovered. Will the reality of their very different worlds bring them together or rip them apart?
author: Amy Romine
